question: Which company announced the installation and commissioning of S128, claimed to be the largest wind turbine generator (WTG) in India?
explanation: Suzlon Energy announced the installation and commissioning of S128, claimed to be the largest wind turbine generator (WTG) in India. The first prototype of S128 has been commissioned at Sanganeri, in Tamil Nadu. It is under testing. It is expected to be certified in 2018. The S128 WTG is available in 2.6 MW to 2.8 MW variants. It offers hub heights up to 140 meters. Suzlon Energy also claims that the wind mill also consists of India's largest rotor blade of size 63 m with a rotor diameter of 128 m.
